name: Dr. Who
description: Navigate the planes of time and space with Dr. Who, a potent indica hybrid originally from Homegrown Natural Wonders who wittily combined parent strains Mad Scientist and Timewreck. This 60% indica strain can deliver swift relief to pain, stress, appetite loss, multiple sclerosis, ADHD, mood disorders, and nausea without lethargy or sedation, making Dr. Who a good choice for any time of the day. Its effects are precluded by a sweet and sour aroma of pineapple and grape. Dr. Who flowers in 56 to 63 days indoors, but also grows well in outdoor gardens.
descriptionPlain: Navigate the planes of time and space with Dr. Who, a potent indica hybrid originally from Homegrown Natural Wonders who wittily combined parent strains Mad Scientist and Timewreck. This 60% indica strain can deliver swift relief to pain, stress, appetite loss, multiple sclerosis, ADHD, mood disorders, and nausea without lethargy or sedation, making Dr. Who a good choice for any time of the day. Its effects are precluded by a sweet and sour aroma of pineapple and grape. Dr. Who flowers in 56 to 63 days indoors, but also grows well in outdoor gardens.

highlightedReviews.text:
Being a Doctor Who fan since the 4th Doctor,  I had to pick this strain up to pay proper homage!!  

As I inhaled the beautifully rolled pre-roll procured from Bloom Phoenix.  I was transformed into the man from Gallifrey!!  Upon exhale I entered the abyss of the T.A.R.D.I.S. in pure whovian bliss!! The air filled with scents of pineapple and grapes.  As i transcended all of time an space,  i was hurtled through the plains of de-stress from my flight from NY!  Then i weaved through the hills of No Mo Paine!  My mood was Thriving, uplifted,  and this creativity grew!   i wanted to love and be loved. Share this inspiring strain. You are travelling with the doctor to what seemed like a millenia! But what seemed like forever was a few hours of Triumphs over the Daleks,  Cybermen and the Weeping Angels! 

 This by far has been one of my best strains to have ever come across!  it is a great representation of the Doctor.  If you ever come across this strain GET IT!!!  
Thanks to @RealFashionista for the delivery of such a magnificent strain!!!!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Dr. Who, Nevil’s Wreck, Kandahar, Kushadelic, and The Third Dimension
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week we’ve added to the Leafly database a collection of sativas, indicas, and hybrids with rich genetic backgrounds that will make you appreciate the care that goes into the breeding process. From TGA Seeds, we have Dr. Who and The Third Dimension, two hybrids that will help you in your magical journeys through time and space. Nevil’s Wreck is everything you’d want in a sativa strain, especially if you’re a patient treating depression or fatigue. Kandahar blesses us with age-old indica genetics that stretch back to Afghanistan, and the newer Kushadelic proves that not all indicas will knock you out cold.
Did you come across any new strains this week? Share your thoughts, feelings, and experiences in a review for your fellow Leafly comrades!
1. Dr. Who
Characteristics of Dr. Who:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Mad Scientist and Timewreck
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Pineapple and grape aroma
Clear-headed and relaxing
May help with pain, stress, appetite loss, multiple sclerosis, ADHD, mood disorders, and nausea
Indoor flowering time of 56 to 63 days

2. Nevil’s Wreck
Characteristics of Nevil’s Wreck:

80% sativa
Cross between Arcata Trainwreck and Neville’s Haze
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
Spicy, floral aroma
Uplifting and alert
May treat depression, fatigue, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 115 days

3. Kandahar
Characteristics of Kandahar:

90% indica
Cross between Afghani and an unknown Afghani Skunk
Breeder: Ministry of Cannabis
Earthy, woody, nutty aroma
Powerful but functional buzz, relaxing
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

4. Kushadelic
Characteristics of Kushadelic:

80% indica
Cross between G-13 Haze and OG Kush
Earthy, floral, citrus aroma
Comfortable, versatile effects conducive for social gatherings
Indoor flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

5. The Third Dimension
Characteristics of The Third Dimension:

60% sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Apollo 13, Jack’s Cleaner, and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Mango, pineapple, and lemon aroma
Creative and stress-relieving
Indoor flowering time of 45 to 50 days

growInfo.growNotes:
Prefers moderate amounts of fertilizer
	May express fruity or diesel-smelling phenotypes
	Trains well as a multi-branched plant or with sea of green (SOG) operations
	Average yield falls between 25-30 grams per plant
